textAfterTable: Game Overview Super Smash Bros. for Wii U and 3DS is a crossover fighting game developed by Sora and Bandai Namco Games which is published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 3DS and Wii U. The latest entry in the popular Super Smash Bros. franchise, the 3DS and Wii U versions of the game feature the same fighting gameplay fans have come to expect with a number of notable additions and new characters, including Mega Man, the Villager from Animal Crossing, and the Wii Fit Trainer.
